cell.html: First appearance of a British club in European competition. Three of the Famous Five scored in the away leg - Lawrie Reilly , Eddie Turnbull and Willie Ormond .
cell.text: First appearance of a British club in European competition. Three of the Famous Five scored in the away leg - Lawrie Reilly , Eddie Turnbull and Willie Ormond .

cell.html: The "away" match was played at Firhill Stadium , Glasgow .
cell.text: The "away" match was played at Firhill Stadium , Glasgow .

cell.html: Reims went on to lose in the final to Real Madrid .
cell.text: Reims went on to lose in the final to Real Madrid .

cell.html: Lausanne withdrew. Hibernian received a 2-0 walkover to the next round.
cell.text: Lausanne withdrew. Hibernian received a 2-0 walkover to the next round.

cell.html: The away goals rule was not in operation. Hibs lost the play-off match 6–0, their biggest defeat in one match in European competition. Roma went on to win the competition .
cell.text: The away goals rule was not in operation. Hibs lost the play-off match 6–0, their biggest defeat in one match in European competition. Roma went on to win the competition .

cell.html: Valencia went on to win the competition .
cell.text: Valencia went on to win the competition .
Hibs lost 3–0 in the play-off match.

cell.html: One of the most famous matches ever played at Easter Road [5] . Hibs overturn a three-goal deficit by scoring five goals past Italian goalkeeping legend Dino Zoff .
cell.text: One of the most famous matches ever played at Easter Road [5] . Hibs overturn a three-goal deficit by scoring five goals past Italian goalkeeping legend Dino Zoff .

cell.html: Leeds United went on to win the competition .
cell.text: Leeds United went on to win the competition .

cell.html: Joe McBride scored a hat-trick in the home leg, the first hat-trick scored by a Hibs player in European competition.
cell.text: Joe McBride scored a hat-trick in the home leg, the first hat-trick scored by a Hibs player in European competition.

cell.html: Hibs were eliminated on the away goals rule .
cell.text: Hibs were eliminated on the away goals rule .

cell.html: Joe McBride scored a hat-trick (his and the club's second in European competition) in the home leg.
cell.text: Joe McBride scored a hat-trick (his and the club's second in European competition) in the home leg.

cell.html: Jimmy O'Rourke scored a hat-trick in the home leg.
cell.text: Jimmy O'Rourke scored a hat-trick in the home leg.

cell.html: Jimmy O'Rourke scored a hat-trick in the home leg for the second straight tie.
cell.text: Jimmy O'Rourke scored a hat-trick in the home leg for the second straight tie.

cell.html: Hibs' biggest win in Europe in one leg and on aggregate.
cell.text: Hibs' biggest win in Europe in one leg and on aggregate.

cell.html: Hibs' biggest aggregate defeat in European competition.
cell.text: Hibs' biggest aggregate defeat in European competition.

cell.html: Liverpool went on to win the competition .
cell.text: Liverpool went on to win the competition .

cell.html: Hibs' first appearance in Europe for over 10 years.
cell.text: Hibs' first appearance in Europe for over 10 years.
The tie went to extra time .

cell.html: Hibs lost on the away goals rule .
cell.text: Hibs lost on the away goals rule .
The tie went to extra time .

cell.html: The first matches under the management of Tony Mowbray .
cell.text: The first matches under the management of Tony Mowbray .

cell.html: Hibs lost on the away goals rule .
cell.text: Hibs lost on the away goals rule .

cell.html: The opposition will be determined the week before the first match.
cell.text: The opposition will be determined the week before the first match.

context.text: Hibernian F.C. in Europe - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Season Competition Round Opposition Nation Home score Away score Aggregate Notes
In all cases the Hibs score is listed first.
, and have themselves reached the quarter-final of the competition they were entered in on five occasions
Hibs have lost on four occasions to the club that went on to win the competition
Hibernian Football Club v d e
, the European Cup in its first season .
Hibernian have a significant history in European competitions . The club was the first British club to enter European competition
